0.1.name: wordpress/nice-map
0.1.description:
Attention: check out the launch blog post and screencast at developmentseed.org

This is a Wordpress port of the Drupal Nice Map module, which also provides an interface for an administrator to set up a WMS server with various layers and projections.

Please Read:

Currently this module doesn't provide a method for actually inputting geo-information to your blog posts. Instead, it allows you to pull information that has already been saved by [WP-Geo]((http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wp-geo/) or geo-mashup. The ability to input information may be added soon, but as it currently stands, either of the aforementioned plugins provide a nice way to select locations, while this plugin gives you ultimate flexibility to use different map data from d
